sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnclubuser ( CLB_ID /* */ , CMMNTY_ID /* */ , OPRTR_AT /* */ , SBSCRB_DE /* */ , SECSN_DE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #clbId# /* */ , #cmmntyId# /* */ , #oprtrAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #secsnDe# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #emplyrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnclubuser SET CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ , CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ , OPRTR_AT=#oprtrAt# /* */ , SBSCRB_DE=#sbscrbDe# /* */ , SECSN_DE=#secsnDe# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */ WHERE CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ AND CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnclubuser WHERE CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ AND CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CLB_ID /* */ , CMMNTY_ID /* */ , OPRTR_AT /* */ , SBSCRB_DE /* */ , SECSN_DE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ FROM comtnclubuser WHERE CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ AND CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */

SELECT CLB_ID /* */ , CMMNTY_ID /* */ , OPRTR_AT /* */ , SBSCRB_DE /* */ , SECSN_DE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ FROM comtnclubuser WHERE 1=1
CLB_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CMMNTY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CLB_ID DESC /* */ , CMMNTY_ID DESC /* */ , EMPLYR_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnclubuser WHERE 1=1
CLB_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CMMNTY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
